#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char ch=getchar();
    while(ch>48&&ch<58)
    {
                       switch(ch)
		               {
			           case '9':
                            cout<<"so";
                            break;
			           case '8':
                            cout<<"bi";
                            break;
			           case '7':
                            cout<<"zi";
                            break;
			           case '6':
                            cout<<"x";
                            break;
			           case '5':
                            cout<<"mk";
                            break;
			           case '4':
                            cout<<"vo";
                            break;
			           case '3':
                            cout<<"ci";
                            break;
			           case '2':
                            cout<<"re";
                            break;
			           case '1':
                            cout<<"pa";
                            break;
		               }
		ch=getchar();
	}
	return 0;
}
